mdRecord.dcterms:title: Unidentified historic photos from Faulkner House
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photographs linked to U.S. Senator Thomas S. Martin. Martin lived in Faulkner House, now home of the Miller Center of Public Affairs, from 1907 to 1919. Workmen installing a smoke detector as part of renovations to the house recently found photographs, a letter, and other documents. A local historian is seeking to identify the photos.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
